attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Ladner Ming Court Restaurant offers a variety of authentic Chinese dishes, and the best food in town. Our family owned and operated restaurant offers dine in, carry out and delivery.
Ladner Ming Court Restaurant offers a variety of authentic Chinese dishes, and the best food in town. Our family owned and operated restaurant offers dine in, carry out and delivery.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Food is my passion - my art is creating a delicious and surprising menu that will overwhelm your every sense. When planning your perfect day, look no further than us. Food lovers beware, you're in for a tasty surprise.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We love to meet people who want to share their love of food at events, private parties and more. Drop us a line or give us a call.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Our owner and head Chef Nader personally hand crafts every single pizza that leaves our shop to ensure quality control. Having led teams at notable restaurants and cruise lines, he constantly strives to create outstanding flavours and be innovative in our offering.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Our vision is to disrupt what people think about what a pizza should be and transform eating pizza into a true culinary experience.  We want every experience you have eating our pies to be a memorable one.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
10 years of experience Gordon's childhood interest has always been cooking. He says "My favourite tv show when I was a kid was iron chef (Japanese version). I will spend more time watching food network then cartoon."
He first started working in Winnipeg as a kitchen helper when he realized his true passion of working in a restaurant. He then moved onto working at a Japanese restaurant to develop his skills in Japanese cuisine. Since studying at the art Institute of Vancouver in culinary art and hospitality in 2007, He continues to pursue his cooking adventures and passion, loving to consistently bring joy through his work delivering the most fresh and local ingredients to the table for everyone to enjoy.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: During the summer of 2015 when I had decided to proceed with my idea of building a restaurant, I had to first come up with a name. My first ideas were "Steveston Seafood Grill, Gordo's diner, G's Burger House and so on. After much thought, I finally decided on the name "Chef's Playground Eatery".
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: All of our creations here at the Playground are fresh, local and lovingly hand-crafted. Even our plates are hand-made right here in Vancouver! Come stop by our kitchen at the beautiful Steveston historic village and enjoy a cup of locally-roasted coffee.Try our seasonal menu using the best seasonal ingredients.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Our restaurant has served fresh seafood and
traditional Japanese cuisine since 2006 in Steveston village.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Steveston, where many Japanese Canadians live, is a harbour village with lots of fresh seafood available. Our restaurant has served fresh seafood and
traditional Japanese cuisine since 2006 in Steveston village. We hope you enjoy our marvelous Japanese food. Thank you!
 
日系人が多く住むスティーブストンは新鮮な魚介類が豊富な港町です。私共のレストランでは2006年より、このスティーブストン漁村にて、新鮮なシーフードと伝統的な日本食を提供させていただいております。どうぞ、ごゆっくりお楽しみくださいませ。
Royal Thai Cuisine Fine Dining

attributes.about_this_biz_history: proudly family owned!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Delicious Fried Chicken and more!
Win Win Chick-N serves the most delicious fried chicken in Steveston Village. All our chickens are locally sourced, and are hand-breaded and freshly cooked right from our kitchen.

We also serve freshly made, thick-cut french fries accompanied with homemade gravy and mashed potatoes. Other must-haves include our delicious, made in house Ube dessert cakes and sweet style macaroni - it's really yummy!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Born and raised in Steveston B.C. Shane is very familiar with the Seafood House.  Starting as a bus boy at the age of 15 Shane had worked in all capacities of the restaurant before purchasing it in 2007.  Not many 31 year old's can say they've been at the same restaurant for 16 years!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: With over 36 years in business, the Seafood House has earned and maintained its award winning reputation of fine dining excellence.  Built as destination restaurant well before the transformation of a small fishing village, the Seafood House has proven itself continually by standing the test of time.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Steveston Seafood House specializes in providing a first class dining experience.  Our highly trained culinary team offers West Coast fair infused with cooking techniques from around the globe.  Steps away from Canada's largest commercial fishing fleet gives new meaning to the word fresh.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
I always want have a pastry shop/coffee shop.
But I turn my way more specialise  with the Liege Style waffles using high in ingredients.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
We have been open for more than 10 years at the same location.
We are one of the few business doing everything from scratch.
We use an old type of waffle recipe.
Egg free, no preservatives and real butter.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
We making Liege style Waffles(yeast dough).
We have over 12 different flavors
During the weekend we do one special.
could be: pie, cake , bread or other.

between 21st to 24th.31
Mega Sushi is an award-winning sushi establishment located near beautiful Steveston Harbour.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Blue Canoe Waterfront Restaurant opened in the summer of 2009 overlooking fishermans wharf and steveston harbour.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Fresh Ocean wise fish and shellfish as well as mouth-watering Certified Angus Beef steaks. 

A great selection of Starters and Social plates   Hand crafted Cocktails and martinis as well as an extensive craft beer list.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Started in 1989 by Bimla and Hemant Rao to serve OUR Local Community. 

Hemant started working as a Baker for the Bread Garden 8 years before he and his wife founded Steveston Bakery. They spend quite a bit of time traveling and experiencing bakeries south of the boarder and in other countries before opening this bakery.

Steveston Bakery has been creating the finest buns, breads, cakes, sweets, pastries, cookies, and muffins in Steveston daily for over 22 years.  

We are dedicated to providing unsurpassed quality, service, selection, and transporting you back to homemade flavours and smells of the past. 

Everything is homemade from scratch every single day and we also serve breakfast and lunch with fresh roast coffee, the finest of teas, fresh homemade vegetarian and meat based soups, Panini, and sandwiches. We bring in the finest cold cuts, cheese, and hand slice fresh veggies to prepare your sub or Panini just the way you like it.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Steveston Bakery, is one of the villages of Stevenson's most popular destinations for locals and tourists alike since Hemant and Bimla Rao opened the doors in 1989. Not only is it a quaint little bakery and cafe, but it boasts some of the best homemade breads, pastries, cookies, and pies in the area at truly affordable prices. It also creates cakes for all occasions including the eggless variety for the vegetarians out there. If you need a birthday cake, wedding cake, anniversary cake, or just and everyday cake for 5 people or 200 people, Hemant and his team can put it together with loving care just for you.  From Black Forrest to Diplomat, Double Chocolate, Grand Marnier, Mango Mousse, or Tiramisu, just to name a few.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Garden, brunch, bistro
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
A charming & magical piece of heritage in Steveston since 1988, Cannery Cafe now serves favorite comfort food and fusion dishes alike. Only a few minutes walk from the docks, the bistro is a perfect stop to start the morning with classics like egg's benedict or omelette, or unwind halfway thru the day with some fish & chips and mimosa. Also known as Granny's Diner from Once Upon a Time, this is a quintessential spot for fans to enjoy a hot chocolate (Granny's style, of course!) or reenact their favorite scenes from the show.
Dinner is served with reservations only, mainly seafood platters and paella.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
A charming & magical piece of heritage in Steveston since 1988, Cannery Cafe now serves favorite comfort food and fusion dishes alike. Only a few minutes walk from the docks, the bistro is a perfect stop to start the morning with classics like egg's benedict or omelette, or unwind halfway thru the day with some fish & chips and mimosa. Also known as Granny's Diner from Once Upon a Time, this is a quintessential spot for fans to enjoy a hot chocolate (Granny's style, of course!) or reenact their favorite scenes from the show.
Dinner is served with reservations only, mainly seafood platters and paella.

历史悠久的 Cannery Cafe 花园式餐厅位于风景美丽的渔人码头 （Steveston ,Richmond）, 是温哥华著名的旅游景点。 Cannery Cafe 因连续5年作为拍摄美剧《Once Upon a Time》的外景地闻名遐迩！如果想吃一个懒洋洋的早午餐，Cannery Cafe是一个非常不错的选择。在cafe举办活动、生日party非常温馨，私人订制餐点，也可上门做catering服务。
Upscale casual dining

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Jens Hertha was introduced to these wondrous meats through Drews' son and fellow Canucks fan Thorston Stock. Originally from Germany, Jens was surprised to find the authentic taste of home here in Canada. He immediately asked where he could buy them and was told that Drews' sausages were only produced for specialty commercial locations. Undaunted, Jens went straight to the source, visiting Drews' manufacturing facility to buy direct. As a true sausage connoisseur, Jens began to feel it was his duty to bring these culinary marvels to the masses. In August 2011, after a vacation back in the fatherland, Jens felt it was time to bring a taste of Germany to Vancouver. He and Thorsten got together and started to work on making D Original Sausage Haus a reality.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The store was opened by Jens Hertha and Thorsten Stock, son of sausage maker Drews Driessen who proudly crafts all our sausages. Drews is a man intent on bringing the best of old world back. A fifth-generation sausage maker from Germany, Drews settled in Canada 21 years ago. After stints in commercial plants, the call of the casings grew too strong. Drews had to go back to sausage making and put his 35 years of experience to work. He began with a secretive workshop off Main Street, crafting smoked and air-cured beauties using traditional methods that don't require the vast amounts of salt and sulphurs that modern short- cuts demand. Drews' sausages are made from hand-selected meat, ethically and (where possible) locally raised. Their quality is evident in the unbelievable flavour of our sausages - wholesome, meaty, natural.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Handmade, traditional sausages from around the world and fine cheeses. From barbecue bratwurst, fine salamis and prosciutto hams to sandwich meats, we have it all. All sausages are handcrafted by a 5th generation sausage maker.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The original Oretachi Curry shop opened in the year 2012 by Mr. Sugimura in the town of Namba Osaka, Japan, located just on the east side of Nankai Namba station with a genuine focus on quality and taste. After being featured as “The best Curry in Osaka…” on the famous Japanese TV variety show “YOUは何しに日本へ,” Oretachi Curry became a trending restaurant for serving one of the best comforting Japanese curry dishes.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Oretachi Curry, we serve authentic Osaka-based Japanese Curry Rice and one of a kind Curry ramen in our special prawn miso based broth. Our in house curry dishes with a combination of over 20 spices and herbs is made daily from the freshest ingredients sourced locally in BC with some key ingredients imported directly from Japan. The key to our success is simple: serving delicious authentic Japanese curry every single time. We pride ourselves on serving our customers delicious genuine Japanese Curry along with a friendly casual atmosphere just as if you are in Japan. Eat delicious Food. Grab a drink. But most of all, relax! We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support in our small restaurant.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Kulvir, Sukhi and family are excited and proud to be the new owners of Pizza Factory Richmond. They bring to this pizzeria a strong sense of community, commitment to quality, and friendly customer service -- not to mention the most delicious pizza in Richmond!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Richmond Pizza Factory is a family-owned restaurant that has been serving the residents of Richmond since 2001. Since early spring 2016, the restaurant has been under new management and we are making some exciting changes that we hope you will love, including adding new items to our menu, opening for lunch at 11am daily, and, for the first time, offering pizza by the slice!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The Richmond Pizza Factory is a family-owned restaurant that has been serving the residents of Richmond since 2001. Since early spring 2016, the restaurant has been under new management and we are making some exciting changes that we hope you will love, including adding new items to our menu and, for the first time, offering pizza by the slice.

Located in the heart of Steveston Village, we serve our delicious pizza made fresh in a wide variety of flavors with lots of fresh ingredients. Our hand-tossed dough is made fresh daily, and you can choose from original or thin crust for any pizza. Each pizza is made with 100% real mozzarella cheese and our own tomato sauce.

You will always find quality food, exceptional service, and friendly hardworking staff at Pizza Factory Richmond. Visit us next time you come to Steveston, and check out the new changes we are making... we look forward to being your favorite neighborhood pizzeria.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Veerpal Kaur Bhatti is general manager of Best Bite Indian Cuisine. I am from India . I came to Toronto in 2010 as student I studied Biotechnology technicians in food microbiology . My first job was at Indian restaurant as server . This is family owned business by me and My husband Chef (Ramandeep Singh Bhatti) .
attributes.about_this_biz_history: We opened out doors in November 2019 because Richmond needed more Indian food!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: New Authentic Indian Restaurant in Richmond, BC. Come in, let us know you found us on Yelp, and try our delicious appetizers and entrees. We also offer takeout and delivery!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Little Mexico Cantina under new management.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Located in Steveston B.C., Little Mexico Cantina serves authentic regional Mexican cuisine.  Winner of the prestigious Vancouver Taco Challenge in 2015, 2016 & 2107
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Offering authentic Mexican cuisine from different regions of Mexico.

Timmy Kitchen is a Family-Operated Chinese Restaurant in Steveston! Our kitchen is a playground where veteran Chefs interact and experiment with ancient and contemporary methods of cooking to deliver Classic and re-imagined Guangzhou-nese and Chinese dishes.
These chefs are motivated by their pure fascination of the culinary arts and its history-- but still care about making sure you leave with a full belly. If you decide to dine with us you'll notice our dishes reflect these values to their core. 
Since 2009.

In the very heart of Fisherman's Wharf in Richmond, Yokohama Teppanyaki & Sushi Bar has been welcome to her restaurant guests from all over the world, for over 20 years. We give the first priority to the taste of ingredients, while exploring our own unique Japanese cuisine based on Teppanyaki style.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Founded in 2005 at Hastings and Richards Street in downtown Vancouver, Waves has been blazing the trail for with superbly fresh brewed coffee, a commitment to local craftsmanship and community, and incomparable service.
In 2008, we were recognized by the Brand Coaches as the Hottest Brand in Canada. We have also been recognized as the Best of Brands by over 1,500 coffee retailers.
Today there are 38 Waves across British Columbia and Alberta and with more to come you'll be sure to ride the Waves with us sometime soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
At Waves, we take two things very seriously: coffee and chocolate. This is why we source and use only the best coffee beans available; 100% Specialty Grade beans purchased directly from small lot farmers. We blend our top quality coffee beans together with real Belgian chocolate (powder, be gone.) The result is a flavorful mocha that is second-to-none.
Waves is committed to providing a fresh and wide variety of sandwiches, wraps, soups and seasonal pastries. Pair our locally-sourced coffee and chocolate beverages with our fresh food menu for an elevated coffee-shop culinary experience.
Top it off with our unique set of offerings like a robust selection of rooibos drinks, free meeting rooms and consistently gracious team members. It's these elements and more that make Waves an intimate and locally-conscious answer to the replicated atmosphere of multinational coffee giants.
Coffee, Tea, Frappe, Iced Drinks, Sandwiches, and Pastries.

Best Pizza in Steveston Village!
Serving food for us is a very sacred practice. John's Pan Pizza is not just a business, it's our passion to serve. 

We owe our success to people of Stevston Village and Richmond. 

We love being part of community and serve residents and the tourists that come here to admire the beauty of our neighborhood.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Kaiseki Omakase
attributes.about_this_biz_history: We start at 2018 January
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
2024 Summer menu 
Kuroki Kaiseki Omakase
黑木関西会席料理
(Not sushi type Omakase)
Starts@$168/person
Below is a list of courses:
1.Appetizers/先付け
2.Seafood Carpaccio /凌ぎ
3.Sashimi 5 kinds/お造り

can add any options.
Reservation only, min 2 ppls
please Call/Text 604-616-1323

-NO cancellations can be made, Only one time accept for appoinment change within 4 days advance notice
-Please let us know any dietary restrictions

attributes.about_this_biz_history: This place was previously owned by a Malaysian and making good Food.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Home made burgers, seafood burgers, hot dogs and hand cut fries

We dish out the baddest burgers because WTF! Our squad digs the biggest and baddest burgers. We want to share the love we have for the patty and the bun with the juiciest, meatiest, most flavourful, sauced-up burgers and fries.

Order from our virtual restaurant or from The Canteen, our virtual food court because "It's All Here".
Available for pickup or delivery on SkipTheDishes or DoorDash or Uber Eats.
Our Menu features Quick, Casual & Quality Seafood Dishes, with choices for the whole family. Our menu is available for eat-in or take-out. Drop by and Say hello!

Drews' sausages are made from hand-selected meat, ethically and (where possible) locally raised. Their quality is evident in the unbelievable flavour of our sausages - wholesome, meaty, natural.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Handmade, traditional sausages from around the world and fine cheeses. From barbecue bratwurst, fine salamis and prosciutto hams to sandwich meats, we have it all. All sausages are handcrafted by a 5th generation sausage maker.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Kulvir, Sukhi and family are excited and proud to be the new owners of Pizza Factory Richmond. They bring to this pizzeria a strong sense of community, commitment to quality, and friendly customer service -- not to mention the most delicious pizza in Richmond!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Richmond Pizza Factory is a family-owned restaurant that has been serving the residents of Richmond since 2001. Since early spring 2016, the restaurant has been under new management and we are making some exciting changes that we hope you will love, including adding new items to our menu, opening for lunch at 11am daily, and, for the first time, offering pizza by the slice!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The Richmond Pizza Factory is a family-owned restaurant that has been serving the residents of Richmond since 2001. Since early spring 2016, the restaurant has been under new management and we are making some exciting changes that we hope you will love, including adding new items to our menu and, for the first time, offering pizza by the slice.

Located in the heart of Steveston Village, we serve our delicious pizza made fresh in a wide variety of flavors with lots of fresh ingredients. Our hand-tossed dough is made fresh daily, and you can choose from original or thin crust for any pizza. Each pizza is made with 100% real mozzarella cheese and our own tomato sauce.

You will always find quality food, exceptional service, and friendly hardworking staff at Pizza Factory Richmond. Visit us next time you come to Steveston, and check out the new changes we are making... we look forward to being your favorite neighborhood pizzeria.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The original Oretachi Curry shop opened in the year 2012 by Mr. Sugimura in the town of Namba Osaka, Japan, located just on the east side of Nankai Namba station with a genuine focus on quality and taste. After being featured as “The best Curry in Osaka…” on the famous Japanese TV variety show “YOUは何しに日本へ,” Oretachi Curry became a trending restaurant for serving one of the best comforting Japanese curry dishes.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Oretachi Curry, we serve authentic Osaka-based Japanese Curry Rice and one of a kind Curry ramen in our special prawn miso based broth. Our in house curry dishes with a combination of over 20 spices and herbs is made daily from the freshest ingredients sourced locally in BC with some key ingredients imported directly from Japan. The key to our success is simple: serving delicious authentic Japanese curry every single time. We pride ourselves on serving our customers delicious genuine Japanese Curry along with a friendly casual atmosphere just as if you are in Japan. Eat delicious Food. Grab a drink. But most of all, relax! We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support in our small restaurant.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Veerpal Kaur Bhatti is general manager of Best Bite Indian Cuisine. I am from India . I came to Toronto in 2010 as student I studied Biotechnology technicians in food microbiology . My first job was at Indian restaurant as server . This is family owned business by me and My husband Chef (Ramandeep Singh Bhatti) .
attributes.about_this_biz_history: We opened out doors in November 2019 because Richmond needed more Indian food!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: New Authentic Indian Restaurant in Richmond, BC. Come in, let us know you found us on Yelp, and try our delicious appetizers and entrees. We also offer takeout and delivery!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Little Mexico Cantina under new management.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Located in Steveston B.C., Little Mexico Cantina serves authentic regional Mexican cuisine.  Winner of the prestigious Vancouver Taco Challenge in 2015, 2016 & 2107
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Offering authentic Mexican cuisine from different regions of Mexico.

Timmy Kitchen is a Family-Operated Chinese Restaurant in Steveston! Our kitchen is a playground where veteran Chefs interact and experiment with ancient and contemporary methods of cooking to deliver Classic and re-imagined Guangzhou-nese and Chinese dishes.
These chefs are motivated by their pure fascination of the culinary arts and its history-- but still care about making sure you leave with a full belly. If you decide to dine with us you'll notice our dishes reflect these values to their core. 
Since 2009.

In the very heart of Fisherman's Wharf in Richmond, Yokohama Teppanyaki & Sushi Bar has been welcome to her restaurant guests from all over the world, for over 20 years. We give the first priority to the taste of ingredients, while exploring our own unique Japanese cuisine based on Teppanyaki style.

Best Pizza in Steveston Village!
Serving food for us is a very sacred practice. John's Pan Pizza is not just a business, it's our passion to serve. 

We owe our success to people of Stevston Village and Richmond. 

We love being part of community and serve residents and the tourists that come here to admire the beauty of our neighborhood.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Founded in 2005 at Hastings and Richards Street in downtown Vancouver, Waves has been blazing the trail for with superbly fresh brewed coffee, a commitment to local craftsmanship and community, and incomparable service.
In 2008, we were recognized by the Brand Coaches as the Hottest Brand in Canada. We have also been recognized as the Best of Brands by over 1,500 coffee retailers.
Today there are 38 Waves across British Columbia and Alberta and with more to come you'll be sure to ride the Waves with us sometime soon!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
At Waves, we take two things very seriously: coffee and chocolate. This is why we source and use only the best coffee beans available; 100% Specialty Grade beans purchased directly from small lot farmers. We blend our top quality coffee beans together with real Belgian chocolate (powder, be gone.) The result is a flavorful mocha that is second-to-none.
Waves is committed to providing a fresh and wide variety of sandwiches, wraps, soups and seasonal pastries. Pair our locally-sourced coffee and chocolate beverages with our fresh food menu for an elevated coffee-shop culinary experience.
Top it off with our unique set of offerings like a robust selection of rooibos drinks, free meeting rooms and consistently gracious team members. It's these elements and more that make Waves an intimate and locally-conscious answer to the replicated atmosphere of multinational coffee giants.
Coffee, Tea, Frappe, Iced Drinks, Sandwiches, and Pastries.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: This place was previously owned by a Malaysian and making good Food.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Home made burgers, seafood burgers, hot dogs and hand cut fries

We dish out the baddest burgers because WTF! Our squad digs the biggest and baddest burgers. We want to share the love we have for the patty and the bun with the juiciest, meatiest, most flavourful, sauced-up burgers and fries.

Order from our virtual restaurant or from The Canteen, our virtual food court because "It's All Here".
Available for pickup or delivery on SkipTheDishes or DoorDash or Uber Eats.
Our Menu features Quick, Casual & Quality Seafood Dishes, with choices for the whole family. Our menu is available for eat-in or take-out. Drop by and Say hello!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Food is my passion - my art is creating a delicious and surprising menu that will overwhelm your every sense. When planning your perfect day, look no further than us. Food lovers beware, you're in for a tasty surprise.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We love to meet people who want to share their love of food at events, private parties and more. Drop us a line or give us a call.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Our owner and head Chef Nader personally hand crafts every single pizza that leaves our shop to ensure quality control. Having led teams at notable restaurants and cruise lines, he constantly strives to create outstanding flavours and be innovative in our offering.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Our vision is to disrupt what people think about what a pizza should be and transform eating pizza into a true culinary experience.  We want every experience you have eating our pies to be a memorable one.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
10 years of experience Gordon's childhood interest has always been cooking. He says "My favourite tv show when I was a kid was iron chef (Japanese version). I will spend more time watching food network then cartoon."
He first started working in Winnipeg as a kitchen helper when he realized his true passion of working in a restaurant. He then moved onto working at a Japanese restaurant to develop his skills in Japanese cuisine. Since studying at the art Institute of Vancouver in culinary art and hospitality in 2007, He continues to pursue his cooking adventures and passion, loving to consistently bring joy through his work delivering the most fresh and local ingredients to the table for everyone to enjoy.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: During the summer of 2015 when I had decided to proceed with my idea of building a restaurant, I had to first come up with a name. My first ideas were "Steveston Seafood Grill, Gordo's diner, G's Burger House and so on. After much thought, I finally decided on the name "Chef's Playground Eatery".
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: All of our creations here at the Playground are fresh, local and lovingly hand-crafted. Even our plates are hand-made right here in Vancouver! Come stop by our kitchen at the beautiful Steveston historic village and enjoy a cup of locally-roasted coffee.Try our seasonal menu using the best seasonal ingredients.
Royal Thai Cuisine Fine Dining

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Our restaurant has served fresh seafood and
traditional Japanese cuisine since 2006 in Steveston village.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Steveston, where many Japanese Canadians live, is a harbour village with lots of fresh seafood available. Our restaurant has served fresh seafood and
traditional Japanese cuisine since 2006 in Steveston village. We hope you enjoy our marvelous Japanese food. Thank you!
 
日系人が多く住むスティーブストンは新鮮な魚介類が豊富な港町です。私共のレストランでは2006年より、このスティーブストン漁村にて、新鮮なシーフードと伝統的な日本食を提供させていただいております。どうぞ、ごゆっくりお楽しみくださいませ。

attributes.about_this_biz_history: proudly family owned!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Delicious Fried Chicken and more!
Win Win Chick-N serves the most delicious fried chicken in Steveston Village. All our chickens are locally sourced, and are hand-breaded and freshly cooked right from our kitchen.

We also serve freshly made, thick-cut french fries accompanied with homemade gravy and mashed potatoes. Other must-haves include our delicious, made in house Ube dessert cakes and sweet style macaroni - it's really yummy!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Born and raised in Steveston B.C. Shane is very familiar with the Seafood House.  Starting as a bus boy at the age of 15 Shane had worked in all capacities of the restaurant before purchasing it in 2007.  Not many 31 year old's can say they've been at the same restaurant for 16 years!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: With over 36 years in business, the Seafood House has earned and maintained its award winning reputation of fine dining excellence.  Built as destination restaurant well before the transformation of a small fishing village, the Seafood House has proven itself continually by standing the test of time.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Steveston Seafood House specializes in providing a first class dining experience.  Our highly trained culinary team offers West Coast fair infused with cooking techniques from around the globe.  Steps away from Canada's largest commercial fishing fleet gives new meaning to the word fresh.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
I always want have a pastry shop/coffee shop.
But I turn my way more specialise  with the Liege Style waffles using high in ingredients.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
We have been open for more than 10 years at the same location.
We are one of the few business doing everything from scratch.
We use an old type of waffle recipe.
Egg free, no preservatives and real butter.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
We making Liege style Waffles(yeast dough).
We have over 12 different flavors
During the weekend we do one special.
could be: pie, cake , bread or other.

WE WILL HAVE ''BUCHE DE NOEL'' YULE LOGE
between 21st to 24th.31

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The Blue Canoe Waterfront Restaurant opened in the summer of 2009 overlooking fishermans wharf and steveston harbour.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Fresh Ocean wise fish and shellfish as well as mouth-watering Certified Angus Beef steaks. 

A great selection of Starters and Social plates   Hand crafted Cocktails and martinis as well as an extensive craft beer list.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Started in 1989 by Bimla and Hemant Rao to serve OUR Local Community. 

Hemant started working as a Baker for the Bread Garden 8 years before he and his wife founded Steveston Bakery. They spend quite a bit of time traveling and experiencing bakeries south of the boarder and in other countries before opening this bakery.

Steveston Bakery has been creating the finest buns, breads, cakes, sweets, pastries, cookies, and muffins in Steveston daily for over 22 years.  

We are dedicated to providing unsurpassed quality, service, selection, and transporting you back to homemade flavours and smells of the past. 

Everything is homemade from scratch every single day and we also serve breakfast and lunch with fresh roast coffee, the finest of teas, fresh homemade vegetarian and meat based soups, Panini, and sandwiches. We bring in the finest cold cuts, cheese, and hand slice fresh veggies to prepare your sub or Panini just the way you like it.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Steveston Bakery, is one of the villages of Stevenson's most popular destinations for locals and tourists alike since Hemant and Bimla Rao opened the doors in 1989. Not only is it a quaint little bakery and cafe, but it boasts some of the best homemade breads, pastries, cookies, and pies in the area at truly affordable prices. It also creates cakes for all occasions including the eggless variety for the vegetarians out there. If you need a birthday cake, wedding cake, anniversary cake, or just and everyday cake for 5 people or 200 people, Hemant and his team can put it together with loving care just for you.  From Black Forrest to Diplomat, Double Chocolate, Grand Marnier, Mango Mousse, or Tiramisu, just to name a few.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Garden, brunch, bistro
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
A charming & magical piece of heritage in Steveston since 1988, Cannery Cafe now serves favorite comfort food and fusion dishes alike. Only a few minutes walk from the docks, the bistro is a perfect stop to start the morning with classics like egg's benedict or omelette, or unwind halfway thru the day with some fish & chips and mimosa. Also known as Granny's Diner from Once Upon a Time, this is a quintessential spot for fans to enjoy a hot chocolate (Granny's style, of course!) or reenact their favorite scenes from the show.
Dinner is served with reservations only, mainly seafood platters and paella.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
A charming & magical piece of heritage in Steveston since 1988, Cannery Cafe now serves favorite comfort food and fusion dishes alike. Only a few minutes walk from the docks, the bistro is a perfect stop to start the morning with classics like egg's benedict or omelette, or unwind halfway thru the day with some fish & chips and mimosa. Also known as Granny's Diner from Once Upon a Time, this is a quintessential spot for fans to enjoy a hot chocolate (Granny's style, of course!) or reenact their favorite scenes from the show.
Dinner is served with reservations only, mainly seafood platters and paella.

历史悠久的 Cannery Cafe 花园式餐厅位于风景美丽的渔人码头 （Steveston ,Richmond）, 是温哥华著名的旅游景点。 Cannery Cafe 因连续5年作为拍摄美剧《Once Upon a Time》的外景地闻名遐迩！如果想吃一个懒洋洋的早午餐，Cannery Cafe是一个非常不错的选择。在cafe举办活动、生日party非常温馨，私人订制餐点，也可上门做catering服务。
Upscale casual dining

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Jens Hertha was introduced to these wondrous meats through Drews' son and fellow Canucks fan Thorston Stock. Originally from Germany, Jens was surprised to find the authentic taste of home here in Canada. He immediately asked where he could buy them and was told that Drews' sausages were only produced for specialty commercial locations. Undaunted, Jens went straight to the source, visiting Drews' manufacturing facility to buy direct. As a true sausage connoisseur, Jens began to feel it was his duty to bring these culinary marvels to the masses. In August 2011, after a vacation back in the fatherland, Jens felt it was time to bring a taste of Germany to Vancouver. He and Thorsten got together and started to work on making D Original Sausage Haus a reality.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: The store was opened by Jens Hertha and Thorsten Stock, son of sausage maker Drews Driessen who proudly crafts all our sausages. Drews is a man intent on bringing the best of old world back. A fifth-generation sausage maker from Germany, Drews settled in Canada 21 years ago. After stints in commercial plants, the call of the casings grew too strong. Drews had to go back to sausage making and put his 35 years of experience to work. He began with a secretive workshop off Main Street, crafting smoked and air-cured beauties using traditional methods that don't require the vast amounts of salt and sulphurs that modern short- cuts demand. Drews' sausages are made from hand-selected meat, ethically and (where possible) locally raised. Their quality is evident in the unbelievable flavour of our sausages - wholesome, meaty, natural.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Handmade, traditional sausages from around the world and fine cheeses. From barbecue bratwurst, fine salamis and prosciutto hams to sandwich meats, we have it all. All sausages are handcrafted by a 5th generation sausage maker.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The original Oretachi Curry shop opened in the year 2012 by Mr. Sugimura in the town of Namba Osaka, Japan, located just on the east side of Nankai Namba station with a genuine focus on quality and taste. After being featured as “The best Curry in Osaka…” on the famous Japanese TV variety show “YOUは何しに日本へ,” Oretachi Curry became a trending restaurant for serving one of the best comforting Japanese curry dishes.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Oretachi Curry, we serve authentic Osaka-based Japanese Curry Rice and one of a kind Curry ramen in our special prawn miso based broth. Our in house curry dishes with a combination of over 20 spices and herbs is made daily from the freshest ingredients sourced locally in BC with some key ingredients imported directly from Japan. The key to our success is simple: serving delicious authentic Japanese curry every single time. We pride ourselves on serving our customers delicious genuine Japanese Curry along with a friendly casual atmosphere just as if you are in Japan. Eat delicious Food. Grab a drink. But most of all, relax! We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support in our small restaurant.

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Your Place to Connect
To wave is a simple gesture which invites connection.
When was the last time you genuinely connected with something or someone? Chances are it was far too long ago. We set out to create a place where friends, family, and strangers could feel good coming together as a community. Waves Coffee invites you to connect with each other, a good cup of coffee, or something you've long forgotten. This is the sentiment and the origin behind our name.
At Waves, we take two things very seriously: coffee and chocolate. This is why we source and use only the best coffee beans available; 100% Specialty Grade beans purchased directly from small lot farmers. We blend our top quality coffee beans together with real Belgian chocolate (powder, be gone.) The result is a flavorful mocha that is second-to-none.
Waves is committed to providing a fresh and wide variety of sandwiches, wraps, soups and seasonal pastries. Pair our locally-sourced coffee and chocolate beverages with our fresh food menu for an elevated coffee-shop culinary experience.
Top it off with our unique set of offerings like a robust selection of rooibos drinks, free meeting rooms and consistently gracious team members. It's these elements and more that make Waves an intimate and locally-conscious answer to the replicated atmosphere of multinational coffee giants.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Kelly and Jaz worked as chef and managers before taking over in 2016
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Open for breakfast and lunch
